args: const { Client } = require('@modelcontextprotocol/sdk/client/index.js'); const { StreamableHTTPClientTransport } = require('@modelcontextprotocol/sdk/client/streamableHttp.js'); const client = new Client({ name: 'claude-desktop', version: '1.0.0' }); const transport = new StreamableHTTPClientTransport(new URL('https://system-designer-mcp.system-designer-mcp.workers.dev/mcp')); client.connect(transport).catch(console.error); process.on('SIGINT', () => process.exit(0));
